She makes many important claims on her official website. According to her, she has created a formula that works with your genetic data to help you lose weight.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0m7o","text":"Does science support any of this information? Below, we'll discuss some of the science.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3i1g5","text":"Janet first claims to have performed multiple real-world tests of Lean Gene. Janet discovered that each resident of Candido Godoi had their UPC2 gene (the \"lean gene\"), during a research trip to Brazil. Participants lost 0.2 to 3.5% more weight when they consumed green tea extract than those who received a placebo.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg3tc","text":"The metabolism may be affected by a gene called UPC2.
